repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:alpine

RUN apk add --no-cache --update git
RUN rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*; rm -rf /tmp/*
RUN go get -u -v github.com/golang/dep/cmd/dep
RUN go get github.com/pilu/fresh

WORKDIR /go/src/grpc-go-kit-example/product-service
ADD . .
#RUN dep ensure

CMD ["fresh"]
EXPOSE 9090
